We can also ask Python to **compare values**:

:::{#lst-comparingvalues}

This code asks "Is the sum of 2 and 3 greater than or equal to the product of 2 and 3?"
```{pyodide}
#| completion: false
2 + 3 >= 2 * 3
```

This code asks "Is the sum of 2 and 3 less than or equal to the product of 2 and 3?"
```{pyodide}
#| completion: false
2 + 3 <= 2 * 3
```

Comparing Values!
